alert.note: Alert for Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 3:14PM MST until December 28 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 11 PM MST TUESDAY ABOVE 4500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 4500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Areas above 4500 feet near Chino Valley, Paulden, Prescott Valley and Sedona. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 11 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Slippery and snow covered roads could led to very difficult travel across the high terrain. Hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute. Snow forecast from 5 AM Tuesday to 11 PM Tuesday: Chino Valley 1 to 2 inches Paulden 1 to 2 inches Prescott Valley 1 to 3 inches Sedona 1 to 3 inches
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
